page.title: 16LEISURE QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: A Survey of the leisure pursuits of 14 year old pupils at Kingsdown School. Number in Year: 180 Number in Sample survey: 158 {1.Leisure centres most visited Oasis 70%; Link Centre 18%; Grange Drive Community Centre 4%; Others (e.g.South Marston Country Club, Dorcan swimming pool) 8%. {2.How we get there} Car 46%; Bus 24%; Bicycle 17%; Walk 11%; Others 2%. {3.Most popular sports at the Centres Swimming 57%; Ice skating 16%; roller skating 15%; Others 12%. {4.Frequency of use Once a month: 38%; Once a week: 22%; 2-3 times per week: 19%; Others 21%. {5.Why is leisure important? Enjoyment: 33%; Something to do: 26%; To keep fit: 18%; to relax: 2%; others 21%.
